name: HACKER TOOLS v1.0
description:
For begin open game and type "create virus" and follow the on-screen instructions After that type "send virus" and follow the on-screen instructions 

If you want to know size of your bonet type command "my bonet" 

If you want hack companes type "list orders" and follow the on-screen instructions if after choosing a company nothing happened then you do not have enough computers in the bonet 

This is the base commands of game!
